example.name: storage
example.text: Mary cased the wine for easier storage.

example.name: Planting bugs
example.text: I put a small electric amplifier against the wall on the side *0*-2 I-1 wanted*PRO*-1 to case *T*-2.

roleset.name: a formal argument/petition/big deal

example.text: In *PRO* making cases , the authorities frequently zero in on alleged misrepresentations made by the charities ' fund raisers .
